title: BRIEF-Xerium Technologies Announces Review Of Strategic Alternatives To Maximize Shareholder Value
text: 18 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Xerium Technologies Announces Review Of Strategic Alternatives To Maximize Shareholder Value Reuters Staff   Xerium Technologies Inc: * XERIUM TECHNOLOGIES ANNOUNCES REVIEW OF STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES TO MAXIMIZE SHAREHOLDER VALUE * XERIUM TECHNOLOGIES INC - ‍ALTERNATIVES COULD INCLUDE A SALE OF COMPANY OR OF ITS DIVISIONS AND SELECTED ASSETS IN SEPARATE TRANSACTIONS, * XERIUM TECHNOLOGIES INC - ‍ALTERNATIVES COULD INCLUDE A STRATEGIC MERGER, A REVERSE MORRIS TRUST TRANSACTION, OR OTHER BUSINESS COMBINATION​ * XERIUM TECHNOLOGIES INC - ‍ ENGAGED TN CAPITAL ADVISORS LLC AS FINANCIAL ADVISOR AND LATHAM & WATKINS LLP AS LEGAL ADVISOR TO ASSIST IN PROCESS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
